subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The defending champion Russia slipped past previously unbeaten Greece, 68-65, and France beat Croatia, 87-79, to stay undefeated at the European championship in Bydgoszcz, Poland.
snippet: The defending champion Russia slipped past previously unbeaten Greece, 68-65, and France beat Croatia, 87-79, to stay undefeated at the European championship in Bydgoszcz, Poland.
